name: Chmod 备忘清单
title: 这份快速参考备忘单提供了文件权限的简要概述，以及 chmod 命令的操作

sections.title: 以下是 Chmod 生成器 JS 代码（代码用于网站请忽略不要删除）

cards.title: 简介
cards.body: 这份快速参考备忘单提供了文件权限的简要概述，以及 chmod 命令的操作

cards.title: 示例
cards.code:
$ chmod 755 foo.txt
$ chmod +x quickref.py
$ chmod u-x quickref.py
$ chmod u=rwx,g=rx,o= quickref.sh

cards.body: `chmod` 命令代表“更改模式”

cards.title: Chmod%20%E7%94%9F%E6%88%90%E5%99%A8
cards.body: %60%60%60html%20preview%0A%3Cdiv%3E%0A%E6%9D%83%E9%99%90%EF%BC%9A%3Cinput%20type%3D%22text%22%20id%3D%22num%22%20placeholder%3D%22777%22%20maxlength%3D%223%22%20style%3D%22padding%3A%200.3rem%200.3rem%3B%22%20%2F%3E%20%3Cinput%20type%3D%22text%22%20id%3D%22let%22%20placeholder%3D%22rwxrwxrwx%22%20maxlength%3D%229%22%20style%3D%22padding%3A%200.3rem%200.3rem%3B%22%20%2F%3E%0A%3C%2Fdiv%3E

cards.title: chmod 600
cards.code:
$ chmod 600 example.txt
$ chmod u=rw,g=,o= example.txt
$ chmod a+rwx,u-x,g-rwx,o-rwx example.txt

cards.title: chmod 664
cards.code:
$ chmod 664 example.txt
$ chmod u=rw,g=rw,o=r example.txt
$ chmod a+rwx,u-x,g-x,o-wx example.txt

cards.title: chmod 777
cards.code:
$ chmod 777 example.txt
$ chmod u=rwx,g=rwx,o=rwx example.txt
$ chmod a=rwx example.txt

cards.title: 符号模式
cards.body: 拒绝所有人的执行权限。
向所有人授予读取权限。
使文件可由组和其他人读写。
使用户/所有者可执行 shell。
允许每个人读取、写入和执行文件并打开设置的 group-ID。

cards.title: 删除权限
cards.body: 要删除赋予文件的读写权限，请使用以下语法：
对于我们的文件 example.txt，我们可以通过运行以下命令使用 chmod for group 删除读写权限：
要从组中删除 chmod 读写权限，同时向 public/others 添加读写权限，我们可以使用以下命令：
但是，如果你想删除组和其他人的所有权限，你可以使用 go= 来代替：

cards.title: 网络权限
cards.code:
$ chmod -R 644 /var/www/html/
$ chmod 644 .htaccess
$ chmod 644 robots.txt
$ chmod 755 /var/www/uploads/
$ find /var/www/html -type d -exec chmod 755 {} \;

cards.title: 批量更改

cards.body: 请参阅：[命令替换](https://tldp.org/LDP/abs/html/commandsub.html)

cards.title: 另见
cards.body: • [使用 chmod 修改文件权限](https://www.linode.com/docs/guides/modify-file-permissions-with-chmod/) _(linode.com)_

cards.title: %E4%BB%A5%E4%B8%8B%E6%98%AF%20Chmod%20%E7%94%9F%E6%88%90%E5%99%A8%20JS%20%E4%BB%A3%E7%A0%81%EF%BC%88%E4%BB%A3%E7%A0%81%E7%94%A8%E4%BA%8E%E7%BD%91%E7%AB%99%E8%AF%B7%E5%BF%BD%E7%95%A5%E4%B8%8D%E8%A6%81%E5%88%A0%E9%99%A4%EF%BC%89
cards.body: %60%60%60html%20preview%0A%3C!--%20Chmod%20%E7%94%9F%E6%88%90%E5%99%A8%20JS%20%E4%BB%A3%E7%A0%81%20--%3E%0A%3Cscript%20type%3D%22text%2Fjavascript%22%3E%0Aconst%20reg_num%20%3D%20%2F%5E%5B0-7%5D%7B3%7D%24%2F%3B%20%2F%2F%20%E4%B8%80%E4%BA%9B%E6%AD%A3%E5%88%99%E8%A1%A8%E8%BE%BE%E5%BC%8F%E6%9D%A5%E6%A3%80%E6%9F%A5%20num%20%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%0Aconst%20reg_let%20%3D%20%2F%5E(%5Br%5C-%5D%7B1%7D%5Bw%5C-%5D%7B1%7D%5Bx%5C-%5D%7B1%7D)%7B3%7D%24%2F%3B%20%2F%2F%20%E4%B8%80%E4%BA%9B%E6%AD%A3%E5%88%99%E8%A1%A8%E8%BE%BE%E5%BC%8F%E6%9D%A5%E6%A3%80%E6%9F%A5%E6%96%87%E6%9C%AC%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%0Afunction%20checkBoxHandle()%20%7B%0Achange_occured(true%2C%20false%2C%20false)%3B%0A%2F%2F%20get%20rid%20of%20bad%20input%20classes%0Adocument.getElementById('num').classList.remove('bad-input')%3B%0Adocument.getElementById('let').classList.remove('bad-input')%3B%0A%7D%0Awindow.addEventListener(%22DOMContentLoaded%22%2C%20function%20()%20%7B%0A%2F%2F%20loop%20over%20all%20the%20check%20boxes%0Afor%20(let%20i%20%3D%201%3B%20i%20%3C%2010%3B%20i%2B%2B)%20%7B%0Alet%20checkBox%20%3D%20document.getElementById(%60%24%7Bi%7D%60)%3B%0AcheckBox.addEventListener('change'%2C%20function%20()%20%7B%0Achange_occured(true%2C%20false%2C%20false)%3B

cards.title: 以下是 Chmod 生成器 JS 代码（代码用于网站请忽略不要删除）
cards.body:
// get rid of bad input classes
document.getElementById('num').classList.remove('bad-input');

cards.title: %E4%BB%A5%E4%B8%8B%E6%98%AF%20Chmod%20%E7%94%9F%E6%88%90%E5%99%A8%20JS%20%E4%BB%A3%E7%A0%81%EF%BC%88%E4%BB%A3%E7%A0%81%E7%94%A8%E4%BA%8E%E7%BD%91%E7%AB%99%E8%AF%B7%E5%BF%BD%E7%95%A5%E4%B8%8D%E8%A6%81%E5%88%A0%E9%99%A4%EF%BC%89
cards.body: document.getElementById('let').classList.remove('bad-input')%3B%0A%7D)%3B%0A%7D%0A%2F%2F%20the%20octal%20input%0Alet%20num_input%20%3D%20document.getElementById('num')%3B%0Alet%20num_fn%20%3D%20function%20()%20%7B%0A%2F%2F%20check%20for%20bad%20input%0Aif%20(!reg_num.test(this.value))%20%7B%0Athis.classList.add('bad-input')%3B%0A%7D%20else%20%7B%0Athis.classList.remove('bad-input')%3B%0Achange_occured(false%2C%20true%2C%20false)%3B%0A%7D%0A%7D%3B%0Anum_input.addEventListener('change'%2C%20num_fn)%3B%0Anum_input.addEventListener('keyup'%2C%20num_fn)%3B%0A%2F%2F%20the%20let%20input%0Alet%20let_input%20%3D%20document.getElementById('let')%3B%0Alet%20let_fn%20%3D%20function%20()%20%7B%0A%2F%2F%20check%20for%20bad%20input%0Aif%20(!reg_let.test(this.value))%20%7B%0Athis.classList.add('bad-input')%3B%0A%7D%20else%20%7B%0Athis.classList.remove('bad-input')%3B%0Achange_occured(false%2C%20false%2C%20true)%3B%0A%7D%0A%7D%3B%0Alet_input.addEventListener('change'%2Clet_fn)%3B%0Alet_input.addEventListener('keyup'%2Clet_fn)%3B%0A%7D)%3B%0A%2F*%20SETUP%0Ar-4-1%20%20r-4-4%20%20r-4-7%0Aw-2-2%20%20w-2-5%20%20w-2-8%0Ax-1-3%20%20x-1-6%20%20x-1-9%0A*%2F%0A%2F%2F%20define%20a%20function%20that%20runs%20when%20a%20change%20occures%0Afunction%20change_occured(caller_was_check%2C%20caller_was_num%2C%20caller_was_let)%20%7B%0Alet%20num1%20%3D%200%2C%20num2%20%3D%200%2C%20num3%20%3D%200%3B%20%2F%2F%20these%20are%20the%20three%20numbers%20for%20the%20octal%0Alet%20perm_string%20%3D%20''%3B%20%2F%2F%20holds%20the%20permision%20string%20ex.%20rw-x--r--%0Aif%20(caller_was_check)%20%7B%0A%2F%2F%20loop%20over%20all%20the%20check%20boxes%20and%20get%20the%20permisions%0Afor%20(let%20i%20%3D%201%3B%20i%20%3C%2010%3B%20i%2B%2B)%20%7B%0Alet%20checkBox%20%3D%20document.getElementById(%60%24%7Bi%7D%60)%3B%0Aif%20(checkBox.checked)%20%7B%20%2F%2F%20if%20checked%0Alet%20current_perm%20%3D%20check_to_octal_and_text(i)%3B%0Aperm_string%20%2B%3D%20%60%24%7Bcurrent_perm.perm_let%7D%60%3B%0Aif%20(i%20%3C%3D%203)%20%7B%0Anum1%20%2B%3D%20current_perm.perm_num%3B%0A%7D%20else%20if%20(i%20%3C%3D%206)%20%7B%0Anum2%20%2B%3D%20current_perm.perm_num%3B%0A%7D%20else%20%7B%0Anum3%20%2B%3D%20current_perm.perm_num%3B%0A%7D%0A%7D%20else%20%7B%20%2F%2F%20if%20not%20checked%0Aperm_string%20%2B%3D%20'-'%3B%0A%7D%0A%7D%0A%2F%2F%20set%20the%20permision%20input%20text%0Adocument.getElementById('let').value%20%3D%20perm_string%3B%0Adocument.getElementById('num').value%20%3D%20%60%24%7Bnum1%7D%24%7Bnum2%7D%24%7Bnum3%7D%60%3B%0A%7D%20else%20if%20(caller_was_num)%20%7B%0A%2F%2F%20get%20the%20individual%20numbers%0Alet%20num_input_val%20%3D%20document.getElementById('num').value%3B%0Anum1%20%3D%20num_input_val.substring(0%2C%201)%3B%0Anum2%20%3D%20num_input_val.substring(1%2C%202)%3B%0Anum3%20%3D%20num_input_val.substring(2%2C%203)%3B%0A%2F%2F%20set%20the%20checkboxes%20and%20get%20the%20perm%20string%0Aperm_string%20%2B%3D%20octal_to_check_and_txt(num1%2C%200)%3B%20%2F%2FOwner%0Aperm_string%20%2B%3D%20octal_to_check_and_txt(num2%2C%201)%3B%20%2F%2FOwner%0Aperm_string%20%2B%3D%20octal_to_check_and_txt(num3%2C%202)%3B%20%2F%2FOwner%0A%2F%2F%20set%20the%20permision%20input%20text%0Adocument.getElementById('let').value%20%3D%20perm_string%3B%0A%7D%20else%20if%20(caller_was_let)%20%7B%0A%2F%2F%20get%20the%20text%20input%0Alet%20perm_text%20%3D%20document.getElementById('let').value%3B%0Anum1%20%3D%20text_to_check_and_octal(perm_text.substring(0%2C%203)%2C%200)%0Anum2%20%3D%20text_to_check_and_octal(perm_text.substring(3%2C%206)%2C%203)%0Anum3%20%3D%20text_to_check_and_octal(perm_text.substring(6%2C%209)%2C%206)%0A%2F%2F%20set%20the%20octal%20value%0Adocument.getElementById('num').value%20%3D%20%60%24%7Bnum1%7D%24%7Bnum2%7D%24%7Bnum3%7D%60%3B%0A%7D%0A%7D%0A%2F%2F%20define%20a%20function%20to%20converts%20the%20checkbox%20%23%20to%20the%20respective%20permissions%0A%2F%2F%20returns%20perm_num%2C%20perm_let%0Afunction%20check_to_octal_and_text(check_num)%20%7B%0Alet%20perm_num%20%3D%200%3B%0Alet%20perm_let%20%3D%20'-'%3B%0Aswitch%20(check_num)%20%7B%0Acase%201%3A%0Acase%204%3A%0Acase%207%3A%0Aperm_num%20%3D%204%3B%0Aperm_let%20%3D%20'r'%3B%0Abreak%3B%0Acase%202%3A%0Acase%205%3A%0Acase%208%3A%0Aperm_num%20%3D%202%3B%0Aperm_let%20%3D%20'w'%3B%0Abreak%3B%0Acase%203%3A%0Acase%206%3A%0Acase%209%3A%0Aperm_num%20%3D%201%3B%0Aperm_let%20%3D%20'x'%3B%0Abreak%3B%0Adefault%3A%0Aperm_num%20%3D%200%3B%0Aperm_let%20%3D%20'-'%3B%0A%7D%0A%2F%2F%20return%20values%0Areturn%20%7B%0Aperm_num%2C%0Aperm_let%0A%7D%3B%0A%7D%0A%2F**%0ATakes%20a%20number%201-7%20and%20which%20class%20it%20is%20in%3A%0A0%20%3D%20owner%0A1%20%3D%20Group%0A2%20%3D%20Public%0AReturns%3A%20perm%20text%20(ex.%20%22rwx%22)%20and%20sets%20the%20appropriate%20checkboxes%0A*%2F%0Afunction%20octal_to_check_and_txt(octal_num%2C%20class_num)%20%7B%0Alet%20perm_text%20%3D%20''%3B%0Alet%20offset%20%3D%20class_num%20*%203%3B%0Aswitch%20(octal_num)%20%7B%0Acase%20'1'%3A%0Adocument.getElementById(%60%24%7B1%20%2B%20offset%7D%60).checked%20%3D%20false%3B%0Adocument.getElementById(%60%24%7B2%20%2B%20offset%7D%60).checked%20%3D%20false%3B%0Adocument.getElementById(%60%24%7B3%20%2B%20offset%7D%60).checked%20%3D%20true%3B%0Aperm_text%20%3D%20'--x'%3B%0Abreak%3B%0Acase%20'2'%3A%0Adocument.getElementById(%60%24%7B1%20%2B%20offset%7D%60).checked%20%3D%20false%3B%0Adocument.getElementById(%60%24%7B2%20%2B%20offset%7D%60).checked%20%3D%20true%3B%0Adocument.getElementById(%60%24%7B3%20%2B%20offset%7D%60).checked%20%3D%20false%3B%0Aperm_text%20%3D%20'-w-'%3B%0Abreak%3B%0Acase%20'3'%3A%0Adocument.getElementById(%60%24%7B1%20%2B%20offset%7D%60).checked%20%3D%20false%3B%0Adocument.getElementById(%60%24%7B2%20%2B%20offset%7D%60).checked%20%3D%20true%3B%0Adocument.getElementById(%60%24%7B3%20%2B%20offset%7D%60).checked%20%3D%20true%3B%0Aperm_text%20%3D%20'-wx'%3B%0Abreak%3B%0Acase%20'4'%3A%0Adocument.getElementById(%60%24%7B1%20%2B%20offset%7D%60).checked%20%3D%20true%3B%0Adocument.getElementById(%60%24%7B2%20%2B%20offset%7D%60).checked%20%3D%20false%3B%0Adocument.getElementById(%60%24%7B3%20%2B%20offset%7D%60).checked%20%3D%20false%3B%0Aperm_text%20%3D%20'r--'%3B%0Abreak%3B%0Acase%20'5'%3A%0Adocument.getElementById(%60%24%7B1%20%2B%20offset%7D%60).checked%20%3D%20true%3B%0Adocument.getElementById(%60%24%7B2%20%2B%20offset%7D%60).checked%20%3D%20false%3B%0Adocument.getElementById(%60%24%7B3%20%2B%20offset%7D%60).checked%20%3D%20true%3B%0Aperm_text%20%3D%20'r-x'%3B%0Abreak%3B%0Acase%20'6'%3A%0Adocument.getElementById(%60%24%7B1%20%2B%20offset%7D%60).checked%20%3D%20true%3B%0Adocument.getElementById(%60%24%7B2%20%2B%20offset%7D%60).checked%20%3D%20true%3B%0Adocument.getElementById(%60%24%7B3%20%2B%20offset%7D%60).checked%20%3D%20false%3B%0Aperm_text%20%3D%20'rw-'%3B%0Abreak%3B%0Acase%20'7'%3A%0Adocument.getElementById(%60%24%7B1%20%2B%20offset%7D%60).checked%20%3D%20true%3B%0Adocument.getElementById(%60%24%7B2%20%2B%20offset%7D%60).checked%20%3D%20true%3B%0Adocument.getElementById(%60%24%7B3%20%2B%20offset%7D%60).checked%20%3D%20true%3B%0Aperm_text%20%3D%20'rwx'%3B%0Abreak%3B%0Adefault%3A%0Adocument.getElementById(%60%24%7B1%20%2B%20offset%7D%60).checked%20%3D%20false%3B%0Adocument.getElementById(%60%24%7B2%20%2B%20offset%7D%60).checked%20%3D%20false%3B%0Adocument.getElementById(%60%24%7B3%20%2B%20offset%7D%60).checked%20%3D%20false%3B%0Aperm_text%20%3D%20'---'%3B%0A%7D%0Areturn%20perm_text%3B%0A%7D%0A%2F**%0ATakes%203%20letters%20(r%2C%20w%2C%20x%2C%20-%20%20%20%20ex.%20'rw-')%20and%20an%20offset%20(0%2C3%2C6)%0AReturns%20the%20octal%20num%20and%20sets%20the%20appropriate%20checkboxes%0A*%2F%0Afunction%20text_to_check_and_octal(letters%2C%20offset)%20%7B%0Alet%20perm_num%20%3D%200%3B%20%2F%2F%20the%20octal%20number%20to%20return%0A%2F%2F%20add%20up%20the%20oct%20num%20and%20set%20the%20check%20boxes%0Afor%20(let%20i%20%3D%200%3B%20i%20%3C%203%3B%20i%2B%2B)%20%7B%0Acurrent_let%20%3D%20letters.substring(i%2C%20i%20%2B%201)%3B%0Aif%20(current_let%20%3D%3D%20'r')%20%7B%0Adocument.getElementById(%60%24%7Bi%20%2B%201%20%2B%20offset%7D%60).checked%20%3D%20true%3B%0Aperm_num%20%2B%3D%204%3B%0A%7D%20else%20if%20(current_let%20%3D%3D%20'w')%20%7B%0Adocument.getElementById(%60%24%7Bi%20%2B%201%20%2B%20offset%7D%60).checked%20%3D%20true%3B%0Aperm_num%20%2B%3D%202%3B%0A%7D%20else%20if%20(current_let%20%3D%3D%20'x')%20%7B%0Adocument.getElementById(%60%24%7Bi%20%2B%201%20%2B%20offset%7D%60).checked%20%3D%20true%3B%0Aperm_num%20%2B%3D%201%3B%0A%7D%20else%20%7B%0Adocument.getElementById(%60%24%7Bi%20%2B%201%20%2B%20offset%7D%60).checked%20%3D%20false%3B%0A%7D%0A%7D%0Areturn%20perm_num%3B%0A%7D%0A%3C%2Fscript%3E
